os:OpenSearchDescription.os:Description: MOSDAC Dataset search using geo, time and parameter extensions

params:Parameter.name: datasetId
params:Parameter.title: Standard Products archived at MOSDAC registered at GCMD

params:Parameter.name: boundingBox
params:Parameter.title: spatial extent overlapping this bound box WEST-LONG, SOUTH-LAT, EAST-LONG, NORTH-LAT

params:Parameter.name: startTime
params:Parameter.title: temporal extent containing this start time. The string should match 'YYYY-MM-DD

params:Parameter.name: endTime
params:Parameter.title: temporal extent containing this end time. The string should match 'YYYY-MM-DD

params:Parameter.name: startIndex
params:Parameter.title: Index number of search results desired by client

params:Parameter.name: count
params:Parameter.title: Number of Results per query allowed(Default is 20)

params:Parameter.name: keyword
params:Parameter.title: Inventory with terms expressed by these search terms

params:Parameter.name: instrument
params:Parameter.title: Inventory associated with a satellite instrument expressed by this short name

params:Parameter.name: satellite
params:Parameter.title: Inventory associated with a Satellite/platform expressed by this short name

params:Parameter.name: boundingBox
params:Parameter.title: Inventory with a spatial extent overlapping this bounding box

params:Parameter.name: startTime
params:Parameter.title: Inventory with a temporal extent containing this start time. The string should match 'YYYY-MM-DD'

params:Parameter.name: endTime
params:Parameter.title: Inventory with a temporal extent containing this end time. The string should match 'YYYY-MM-DD'

params:Parameter.name: startIndex
params:Parameter.title: Index number of search results desired by client

params:Parameter.name: count
params:Parameter.title: Number of Results per query allowed(Default is 20)

params:Parameter.name: clientId
params:Parameter.title: Client identifier to be used for metrics
